title: Ticket #4064: Investigate sse4a cpuflag.
description: It seems unlikely that a processor includes 'sse4a' (an AMD extension to SSE 4) but not any of the {ssse3, sse4_1, sse4_2) set, yet some Linux kernels claim this to be the case. This is probably not intrinsically important, but may become necessary to understand with a future version of glibc.
remarks:
